headline: Ecolab Declares Cash Dividend
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., August 07, 2025--The board of directors of Ecolab Inc. today declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.65 per common share, to be paid October 15, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on September 16, 2025.

headline: Ecolab (ECL) Welcomes Julie P. Whalen As New Board Member And Audit Committee Expert
summary: Ecolab (ECL) has recently appointed Julie P. Whalen as an independent director, adding her extensive financial expertise to the board. This leadership change comes amid various developments, such as the company's positive Q2 earnings results and strategic product launches like the AI-powered RushReady™, which collectively highlight Ecolab's commitment to innovation and improved operational efficiency. Over the past quarter, Ecolab's share price rose by 6%, aligning with the broader market's...
